snippet: The Greenpeace ship departed for the Netherlands nearly a year after Russian authorities seized it during a protest against an oil platform, Greenpeace International said.
abstract: Greenpeace International reports ship Arctic Sunrise has departed for Netherlands nearly year after Russian authorities seized it during a protest against an oil platform planned to be located within Arctic Circle.
lead_paragraph: The Greenpeace ship departed for the Netherlands nearly a year after Russian authorities seized it during a protest against an oil platform, Greenpeace International said.

headline.main: The Netherlands: A Greenpeace Ship Heads Home After a Russian Ordeal
headline.print_headline: The Netherlands: A Greenpeace Ship Heads Home After a Russian Ordeal
